resources.string: In "Santa Fé de Antioquia" Colombia, you will find various hotels and lodgings $30000 COP per night, excellent rooms with the best location nearby to the main square of the principal park.
In "Santa Fé de Antioquia" there are many restaurants, with all the delicacies that offer a place that has all thermal smalls come and try our cuisines.

Santa Fé de Antioquia, a charming town nestled in the mountains of Colombia, offers a rich tourist experience that combines its historical and architectural heritage with the natural beauty of its surroundings.
